sentences.sContent: She was treated by her local doctor.
sentences.sCn: 她由她的本区医生治疗。

sentences.sContent: I’d like to make an appointment to see Dr Pugh.
...the most important character doctor should have is professional ethics that is the foremost way to gain trust from patients...

...it is indispensable that communication between doctor and patients should be strengthened due to the the fact that doctor-patient communication can be seen as a bridge of two-way communication between doctors and patients...
...she refused to pay for a doctor and spent hours looking for free medical help...
...I think you ought to see a doctor rightaway about that cough...
...This episode gave Doctor Mayer her first clue to something every doctor learns sooner or later--most people just don’t listen very well...
...Gullotta says a healthy man should visit the doctor every year or two...
...until a doctor discovered it by chance...

synos.tran: 修理；窜改，伪造；为…治病；授以博士学位

words.tran: 博士的；博士学位的；有博士学位的

trans.tranOther: someone who is trained to treat people who are ill
